definition: A grouch; a spoilsport; a person who on purpose enjoys spoiling the pleasure of others.
To arouse to action; to start a fire; to ignite.
Producing or related to motion; mobile.
Person who steals or has a desire to steal compulsively.
A rogue; an person who cannot be trusted.
The tolling of a bell, especially to indicate a funeral.
A small hill; a hillock; a small bump.
